task.title: How to Add Addresses
task.shortdesc: This set of tasks is meant to help the user learn how to add an address to their mypack portal.

taskbody.prereq: In order to complete this task, the user must have access to mypack, may need their phone for duo-authentication if working on a laptop or computer, and have access to the internet.

step.cmd: From the left-hand navigation menu, select "Addresses".
Under the appropriate header, select the "Add Diploma Address" button.
step.info: For example, select the "Diploma Address" header, if no address is defined.

step.cmd: You can either select the "Copy From" button to copy the address from address that is already on record, or manually enter an address in the given fields.
